thread.title: 'Roxane Revolution' pushes Hikma higher, as European shares recover
thread.title_full: 'Roxane Revolution' pushes Hikma higher, as European shares recover

author: Tara Cunningham
title: 'Roxane Revolution' pushes Hikma higher, as European shares recover
text: Market Report ‘Roxane Revolution’ pushes Hikma higher, as European shares recover Hikma Pharmaceuticals leapt 4.4pc after two bullish notes said its latest deal will transform the company's growth profile. Barclays injects some momentum into the Hikma share price. Photo: ALAMY By Tara Cunningham , Business Reporter 7:21PM BST 02 Sep 2015
